title.narrative: Creation of (online) directory for every country.

description.narrative: According to the initial planning, an online directory for the four project countries was to be set up within the IFOAM – Organics International website. After discussions with local partners and the local teams, it was decided that the websites will be set up at national level. This will also have as an aim to empower the national actors to communicate more efficiently and be in control on the information that concerns the national movements. The online directory will therefore continue to give details on the main stakeholders in the organic sector in Ghana, Burkina Faso, Sao Tome and Principe and Togo, but will be planned and maintained at the national level. This activity is currently under implementation, with the websites being already finalised in Burkina Faso, Togo and Ghana.
